LanguageData.OG_Astartes_Tech_Base_T1.label: Astartes Neophytes
LanguageData.OG_Astartes_Tech_Base_T1.description: Grants you access to STC templates used by the Adeptus Arbites
LanguageData.OG_Astartes_Tech_Base_T2.label: Astartes Scout
LanguageData.OG_Astartes_Tech_Base_T2.description: Grants you access to STC templates used by the Adeptus Militarum
LanguageData.OG_Astartes_Tech_Base_T3.label: Astartes Brother
LanguageData.OG_Astartes_Tech_Base_T3.description: Grants you access to STC templates used to create finest weapons and wargear in the Departmento Munitorum's arsenal, Tempestus Scions are equipped to carry out missions beyond the capabilities of the rank-and-file Guardsman.
